epic_description: Implement user registration and login functionality with email, mobile, Google/Apple sign-in options.

stories.description: Allow users to register using their email address and set up a password for account access.
stories.acceptance_criteria: Given the user is on the registration page, When they enter a valid email and password, Then they should be successfully registered and logged in.

stories.description: Enable users to log in using their mobile number and receive an OTP for verification.
stories.acceptance_criteria: Given the user is on the login page, When they enter a valid mobile number and OTP, Then they should be successfully logged into their account.

stories.description: Integrate Google and Apple sign-in options for users to log in quickly and securely.
stories.acceptance_criteria: Given the user is on the login page, When they choose Google/Apple sign-in, Then they should be able to log in using their respective accounts.
